file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 26-24-01-04 - PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - REMOVAL/INSTALLATION EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures for the removal/installation of the portable fire extinguishers. B. The location of the portable fire extinguishers of the passenger cabin is shown by means of glyphs. In the cockpit, it is installed behind the pilot seat. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - RE- ALL 26-24-01-000-802-A MOVAL PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - IN- ALL 26-24-01-400-802-A STALLATION EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 26-24-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-24-01-000-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - REMOVAL A. General (1) This task gives the procedure for the removal of the portable fire extinguishers. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin/cockpit H. Removal (Figure 401) SUBTASK 020-002-A (1) Get access to the fire extinguisher. (2) Open the Velcro fastener or belts, as applicable. (3) Remove the fire extinguisher from the support. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 26-24-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL EFFECTIVITY: ALL Portable Fire Extinguisher - Removal/Installation Figure 401 A ZONE 261 A ZONE 223 231 241 A ZONE 262 A ZONE 232 1 1 1 1 2 1 ONLY CONSIDER THE TYPE AND LOCATION OF THE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS APPLICABLE TO YOUR AIRCRAFT CONFIGURATION. 2 FIRE EXTINGUISHER GLYPH 145AMM260191.MCE A EMB-145 - AMM 1285 000-802-A/400 26-24-01 Page 3 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 26-24-01-400-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. PORTABLE FIRE EXTINGUISHERS - INSTALLATION A. General (1) This task gives the procedure for the installation of the portable fire extinguisher. B. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable C. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable D. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable E. Consumable Materials Not Applicable F. Expandable Parts Not Applicable G. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Passenger cabin/cockpit H. Installation (Figure 401) SUBTASK 420-002-A (1) Install the fire extinguisher at the support. (2) Close the Velcro fastener or belts, as applicable.
